sub_topic: Prove that every group of order 72 is isomorphic to either the cyclic group C72, the alternating group A4 × C3 × C2, or one of the 51 non-abelian groups of order 72.
message_1: What are the possible number of non-isomorphic groups of order 72, and what are the specific properties and characteristics of each of these groups?
message_2:
There are 10 non-isomorphic groups of order 72. Here are their specific properties and characteristics:

1. C_72 (Cyclic group of order 72)
   - It is abelian and has a single generator.
   - It has 72 elements, and its only subgroups are cyclic groups of orders dividing 72.

2. C_36 × C_2 (Direct product of cyclic groups of orders 36 and 2)
   - It is abelian and has two generators.
   - It has 72 elements, and its subgroups are direct products of cyclic groups of orders dividing 36 and 2.

3. C_18 × C_4 (Direct product of cyclic groups of orders 18 and 4)
   - It is abelian and has two generators.
   - It has 72 elements, and its subgroups are direct products of cyclic groups of orders dividing 18 and 4.

4. C_9 × C_8 (Direct product of cyclic groups of orders 9 and 8)
   - It is abelian and has two generators.
   - It has 72 elements, and its subgroups are direct products of cyclic groups of orders dividing 9 and 8.

5. C_9 × C_4 × C_2 (Direct product of cyclic groups of orders 9, 4, and 2)
   - It is abelian and has three generators.
   - It has 72 elements, and its subgroups are direct products of cyclic groups of orders dividing 9, 4, and 2.

6. C_6 × C_6 × C_2 (Direct product of cyclic groups of orders 6, 6, and 2)
   - It is abelian and has three generators.
   - It has 72 elements, and its subgroups are direct products of cyclic groups of orders dividing 6, 6, and 2.

7. (C_3 × C_3) ⋊ C_8 (Semidirect product of direct product of cyclic groups of orders 3 and 3 with cyclic group of order 8)
   - It is non-abelian.
   - It has 72 elements, and its subgroups are more complex than those of the abelian groups listed above.

8. (C_9 ⋊ C_4) × C_2 (Semidirect product of cyclic group of order 9 with cyclic group of order 4, then direct product with cyclic group of order 2)
   - It is non-abelian.
   - It has 72 elements, and its subgroups are more complex than those of the abelian groups listed above.

9. C_3 × (C_3 ⋊ C_8) (Direct product of cyclic group of order 3 with semidirect product of cyclic group of order 3 with cyclic group of order 8)
   - It is non-abelian.
   - It has 72 elements, and its subgroups are more complex than those of the abelian groups listed above.

10. C_3 × (C_3 ⋊ C_4) × C_2 (Direct product of cyclic group of order 3 with semidirect product of cyclic group of order 3 with cyclic group of order 4, then direct product with cyclic group of order 2)
    - It is non-abelian.
    - It has 72 elements, and its subgroups are more complex than those of the abelian groups listed above.
